text:
Datica | Account Executive, Director of Account Management, Enterprise Platform Sales Executive | REMOTE or ONSITE

We're hiring for several positions at Datica, with the opportunity to work remote or onsite at one of our three offices (Seattle, Portland and Madison).

For the past four years we've been focused on building the premier platform as a service for healthcare. We service the entire spectrum of the market, from small digital health startups to fortune 50 enterprise organizations. If you're looking to make healthcare better, this is your opportunity to do so. To learn more visit https://datica.com/careers/ - If you have any questions feel free to email me directly ryan at datica.com.
